Your Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma increases by 1.

You learn the following ritual spells: Ant Haul, Ceremony, Commune with Nature, Disguise Self, Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Enhance Leap, Feather Fall, Find Familiar, Longstrider, Rary's Telepathic Bond, Speak with Animals, Speak with Dead, Unseen Servant, and Water Walk.

You also learn 2 utility cantrips of your choice.

When you take a Short Rest, you have a 20% chance to regain a level 1 spell slot. At levels 5 and 12, you gain separate 20% chances to regain a level 2 and level 3 spell slot respectively.

You only pay half the cost to learn spells from scrolls, becoming 25 gold pieces per spell level.

You have learned several <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> and [1] utility cantrips of your choice. You copy spell scrolls at half price. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1.
Contains the <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> you learned from Ritual Caster.

The number you need to roll for a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1. When you hit a target with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> you regain 1m of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>. If you <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critically Hit</LSTag> or strike a killing blow, you regain 3m instead.
You choose not to take a feat.

You have Advantage on Saving Throws to maintain Concentration.

You can also use a Reaction to cast a spell when a hostile creature's movement provokes an Opportunity Attack from you.
